workflow.name: Generate curated local news digests with Gemini AI for Discord
workflow.description:
## AI-Powered Local News Digest to Discord (or Slack/Telegram/WhatsApp)

Stay on top of what‚Äôs happening in your community without drowning in endless RSS feeds.  

This workflow pulls in local news sources daily, filters duplicates, and uses Google‚Äôs Gemini API to rank the most relevant stories before sending a clean digest straight to Discord. (Easily adaptable for Slack, Telegram, WhatsApp, or email.)  

### How it Works
1. **Daily Trigger** ‚Äì Runs every morning at 8AM by default.  
2. **Collect Feeds** ‚Äì Pulls in stories from multiple RSS feeds (customizable to your region).  
3. **Deduplicate & Prepare** ‚Äì Removes repeats and cleans article data.  
4. **AI Scoring** ‚Äì Uses Gemini API to score stories by relevance.  
5. **Filter & Sort** ‚Äì Keeps only the top articles (default: 5).  
6. **Deliver Digest** ‚Äì Formats and sends the summary to Discord (or another messaging app).  

### Why Use This
- **Save time** ‚Äì Skip endless scrolling through local feeds.  
- **Stay relevant** ‚Äì AI ranks stories so you only get what matters most.  
- **Be flexible** ‚Äì Works with any RSS feed and can send to Discord, Slack, Telegram, WhatsApp, or email.  
- **Newsletter/Blogs** ‚Äì Get daily, relevant updates to share on social media, your newsletters, etc.


Perfect for individuals, teams, or community groups who want a daily, high-quality snapshot of local news. üì∞‚ö°

nodes.name: Daily 8AM Trigger
nodes.notes: Change the cron expression to adjust schedule. Current: 8AM daily

nodes.name: Gemini Relevance Scoring
nodes.notes: REPLACE YOUR_GEMINI_API_KEY_HERE with your actual Gemini API key

nodes.name: Limit to Top 5
nodes.notes: Change maxItems to adjust how many articles to send (e.g., 15)

nodes.name: Format Discord Message
nodes.notes: Using RSS descriptions directly - no additional AI summarization to save tokens

nodes.name: Send to Discord
nodes.notes: REPLACE with your actual Discord webhook URL

parameters.content:
## Set Your Gemini API Key. Get for free!
**Link Below For Example: Get your key at Google AI Studio**

https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.0-flash-lite:generateContent?key=YOUR_KEY_HERE

## Set Your News Feeds Here
**Make sure they are rss**

See examples below for link structures. There are tools online to help you find RSS feeds for websites.

## Set how many articles you want.
**Default is 5**
## Might need changing for other sending locations, telegram whatsapp etc.

user.name: Kaden Reese
user.bio: I started automating with Python in 2020 and still use it in workflows when needed, but I‚Äôve recently leaned into n8n for client-facing solutions. Lately I‚Äôve focused on real estate automations, though I also build workflows for email, scraping, and other use cases. Currently Building üëáüèª
